post.description: Accepts user data and creates a new user record in the system.

409.description: Conflict - Resource already exists or violates unique constraint

get.description: Retrieves a user based on the provided UUID parameter.
Returns a paginated list of users. Supports optional search by name.
get.summary: List users with pagination and search

put.description: Updates the user information for the specified UUID.

409.description: Conflict - Resource already exists or violates unique constraint

delete.description: Deletes the user associated with the given UUID from the system.
